name: IceLines-Select Waterfalls of the Canadian Ro
categories: IceLines-Select Waterfalls of the Canadian Ro
description: Taste only the juiciest, icy plums in the Canadian Rockies. This guide includes 53 select ice climbs and features gorgeous colour pics plus detailed route descriptions, including all the pitch-by-pitch details of ascents and decents. Routes range from WI 3-6.
